title: Do NOT buy RP from Amazon currently!
body: Amazon hasn't taken the product down, but apparently all of their $50 codes from Riot have expired, everyone who's bought a code within the past few days has yet to receive anything, if you check the reviews all of the recent ones explain this issue in further detail. I wanted to let more people know before they waste their money as Amazon for some reason has still not removed the ability to purchase RP as this problem persists. It would be really nice if Riot could shed some light on this situation, I've been buying RP on Amazon for over a year and this is really unprofessional.

replies.body: Almost a week and I still haven't received my RP. Come on Riot.

I haven't found any issues with purchasing digital RP codes through Amazon.  I do see some reviews suggesting it, but they are a year old and likely have been resolved already through Amazon.  Are you specifically having an issue with this?
